name: jingor 2048
description:
PLAY 2048 IN THE CUBE EXPANSION(JINGOR FACE)!

Jingor 2048 is a puzzle game, can be used as a hobby, can challenge intelligence, can be leisure entertainment.

In the cube expansion, move the mouse to the corresponding position and press the up, down, left and right arrow keys to move the number until 2048 appears.
Of particular interest is the addition of numbers across an edge in the jingor face.
